thread.title: Officials: Be specific about cybersecurity during acquisition
thread.title_full: Officials: Be specific about cybersecurity during acquisition

title: Officials: Be specific about cybersecurity during acquisition
text:
14 Officials: Be specific about cybersecurity during acquisition 
Federal Times: The administration has been pushing agencies to include more cybersecurity language in contracts, specifically in citing control standards like those advanced by the National Institute of Standards and Technology. Some officials don't think those standards are enough and are encouraging agencies to get specific with vendors when writing cybersecurity requirements.
